chunks.title: Section 4 - Section 4 as amended by section 4 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 4 as amended by section 4 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies in the interpretation and construction of
     regulations that -
     (a) are in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) take effect after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 5 - Section 5 as amended by section 5 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 5 as amended by section 5 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to a reference to an Act that -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) comes into operation at that commencement -
     and whether the reference is contained in an Act passed before or
     after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 7 - Section 7 as substituted by section 6 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 7 as substituted by section 6 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to a reference to the expression
     "prescribed" where the expression appears in an Act -
     (a) passed before and in force at the commencement of the
     lastmentioned section; or
     (b) passed after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 7A - Section 7A as substituted by section 7 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 7A as substituted by section 7 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to and in relation to an Act that -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) comes into operation after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 11 - A power conferred by section 11 , as substituted by section 9 of the
chunks.main_structural_heading: A power conferred by section 11 , as substituted by section 9 of the
chunks.text:
Acts Interpretation Amendment Act 1981 , the exercise of which is
     dependent on the existence of a provision of a kind referred to in
     section 11 (1) or, as the case may be, first referred to in section
     11 (2) , is exercisable where the Act in which the provision is
     contained -
     (a) is passed after the commencement of section 9 of the Acts
     Interpretation Amendment Act 1981 ; and
     (b) was passed before that commencement but the provision had not
     come into operation before that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 13 - Section 13 as amended by section 11 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 13 as amended by section 11 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981  -
     (a) applies to a reference to an Imperial Act or a Commonwealth Act
     that -
     (i) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (ii) comes into operation after that commencement -
     and whether the reference is contained in an Act passed before or
     after that commencement; and
     (b) applies, in the case of a reference contained in an Act that
     came into operation before the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section, whether or not the reference is followed by words
     indicating that the reference includes subsequent amendments of the
     Imperial or Commonwealth Act referred to.

chunks.title: Section 16 - Section 16 as amended by section 12 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 16 as amended by section 12 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies only -
     (a) to an Act, whether passed before or after the commencement of
     the lastmentioned section, which expires after that commencement;
     and
     (b) to regulations, whether made before or after that commencement,
     which are rescinded, expire or cease to have effect after that
     commencement; and
     (c) to any other instrument or document, whether made before or
     after that commencement, which expires or ceases to have effect
     after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 21 - (1) Section 21 as amended by section 13 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: (1) Section 21 as amended by section 13 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to an Act which confers a power to
     appoint a person to an office or position where the Act conferring
     the power -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) comes into operation after that commencement.
     (2) Section 21 (1) as amended by section 5 of the Acts
     Interpretation Amendment Act 1985 applies to an Act which confers a
     power to appoint a person to any office or position where the Act
     conferring the power -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) comes into operation after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 24 - Section 24 as amended by section 14 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 24 as amended by section 14 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to and in relation to the interpretation
     and construction of expressions and references referred to in
     section 24 whether the Act in which those expressions or references
     are contained was passed before or after the commencement of section
     14 of the Acts Interpretation Amendment Act 1981 .

chunks.title: Section 37 - Section 37 as substituted by section 16 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 37 as substituted by section 16 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to and in relation to a penalty specified
     in an Act that -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) comes into operation after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 38 - Section 38 as substituted by section 17 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 38 as substituted by section 17 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to a provision of an Act that -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of the lastmentioned
     section; or
     (b) comes into operation after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 38A - (1) Section 38A as substituted by section 18 of the Acts
chunks.main_structural_heading: (1) Section 38A as substituted by section 18 of the Acts
chunks.text:
Interpretation Amendment Act 1981 applies to a proclamation or an
     order-in-council that -
     (a) is made after the commencement of the lastmentioned section; or
     (b) has been made before that commencement but has not taken effect
     before that commencement -
     and, where made under an Act or Imperial Act, so applies whether the
     Act or Imperial Act was passed before or after that commencement.
     (2) Section 38A as substituted by section 6 of the Acts
     Interpretation Amendment Act 1985 applies to any proclamation or
     order-in-council or to a prescribed instrument within the meaning of
     section 38A that -
     (a) is made after the commencement of section 6 of the Acts
     Interpretation Amendment Act 1985 ; or
     (b) has been made before that commencement but has not taken effect
     before that commencement -
     and, in the case of -
     (c) a proclamation or order-in-council was made under an Act or
     Imperial Act, so applies, whether the Act or Imperial Act was passed
     before or after that commencement; or
     (d) a prescribed instrument, so applies, whether the Act under which
     the instrument is made was passed before or after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 39A - Section 39A as inserted by section 7 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 39A as inserted by section 7 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1985 applies to regulations referred to in subsection
     (1) of section 39A that -
     (a) are in force at the commencement of section 7 of the Acts
     Interpretation Amendment Act 1985 ; or
     (b) come into force after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 40A - Section 40A as inserted by section 8 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 40A as inserted by section 8 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1985 applies to a reference in an Act within the
     meaning of section 40A that -
     (a) is in operation at the commencement of section 8 of the Acts
     Interpretation Amendment Act 1985 ; or
     (b) comes into operation after that commencement.

chunks.title: Section 46 - Section 46 as amended by section 20 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: Section 46 as amended by section 20 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to and in relation to the interpretation
     and construction of the expression "offence" whether the Act in
     which that expression occurs was passed before or after the
     commencement of the lastmentioned section.

chunks.title: Section 47 - (1) Section 47 as amended by section 21 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.main_structural_heading: (1) Section 47 as amended by section 21 of the Acts Interpretation
chunks.text:
Amendment Act 1981 applies to regulations made after the
     commencement of the lastmentioned section and so applies whether the
     Act under which they are made was passed before or after that
     commencement, and section 47 (as in force before that commencement)
     continues to apply to regulations made before that commencement as
     if section 21 of the Acts Interpretation Amendment Act 1981 had not
     been enacted.
     (2) Section 47 as amended by section 9 of the Acts Interpretation
     Amendment Act 1985 applies to regulations made after the
     commencement of the lastmentioned section and so applies whether the
     Act under which they are made was passed before or after that
     commencement.
